bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from M. A. Roberts to Laura Armistead Carter, April 11, 1929

div1.p: Roberts expresses his regret for the error made regarding the date of Carter's lending privileges with the Library of Congress.

div1.head: Letter from M. A. Roberts to Laura Armistead Carter, April 11, 1929
div1.opener:
LP
Book, Misel
Library of Congress.
LP
OFFICE OF THE SUPERINTENDENT
LIBRARY OF CONGRESS
READING ROOM
WASHINGTON
April 11, 1929
My dear Miss Carter:
div1.p: I have your note of March 13, 1929.

The date of your lending privilege was inadvertently
indicated by one of our assistants in our records as Dec. 31,
1928 instead of Dec. 31, 1929.
We regret the inconvenience you have been caused.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours M. A. Roberts M. A. Roberts,
Superintendent of Reading Room.
Miss Laura A. Carter
The Westmoreland
2122 California St. N. W.
Washington, D. C.
